previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Real Salt Lake | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 1, Real Salt Lake 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The expansion class of 2005 renew acquaintances yet again as Chivas USA play host to Real Salt Lake on Saturday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs Real Salt Lake | June 28, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: The second half of #ChivasUSA's 2014 season is now underway! #CHVvRSL http://t.co/fdvhUENdZK

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: The second half of #ChivasUSA's 2014 season is now underway! #CHVvRSL http://t.co/fdvhUENdZK

timelineItems.name: Sawyer Pangborn
timelineItems.text: Stupid move, Luke. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Kali K.
timelineItems.text: Well, uh, that happened. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Dan Haslam
timelineItems.text: Bad challenge by Muholland. Well deserved red card. That is not #RSL soccer. Tough now with a man down.

timelineItems.name: John Richards
timelineItems.text: WHAT?!?!?! Straight RED??? #RSL

timelineItems.name: Jake Hatch
timelineItems.text: That hurts. Can't argue it wasn't a straight red. Bad decision by Luke Mulholland. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Charlie Zahn
timelineItems.text: #RSL is going to defend all game again

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high.

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Horton
timelineItems.text: That's now two straight MLS games with a red card for #RSL.

timelineItems.name: Real Sports Live
timelineItems.text: Pretty easy call. Studs up, right in front of the referee. #RSL http://t.co/2txTCa1bAr

timelineItems.name: Real Sports Live
timelineItems.text: Pretty easy call. Studs up, right in front of the referee. #RSL http://t.co/2txTCa1bAr

timelineItems.name: Dan Haslam
timelineItems.text: AGREEEEEEED. RT @gregmaas11: If you can afford to be down a man to anyone, it's Chivas USA #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Price
timelineItems.text: This is the first soccer game I've attended since May that I'm not working at. What do I do? #halp #RSL

timelineItems.name: Nick Rimando
timelineItems.text: Even when I'm gone its rad to see my family still supporting  @realsaltlake in LA. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: First time Kwame Watson-Siriboe cracks an #RSL game-day 18 since tearing his ACL last June. Long road to recovery nearing its end.

timelineItems.name: M. Karyo
timelineItems.text: Yesssssss! Made home just in time for the game!! Let's go #rsl

timelineItems.name: Eddie Magana
timelineItems.text: #MLS IS BACK! Just the smell iof the green grass ⚽️� who wants a Cinnabon � #CHVvRSL #FearTheGoat #win #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: RSL Nation
timelineItems.text: Hope @jeffcassar doesn't call off the hunt for 3 points here. @RealSaltLake #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.name: carter4real
timelineItems.text: So many stupid decisions on the field lately #RSL are struggling without the leadership of Beckerman and Rimando.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top left corner.

timelineItems.name: Jesse Manscill
timelineItems.text: I've been lovin the #worldcup but nothing is like my #RSL Do work boys!

timelineItems.name: Chalupa Batman
timelineItems.text: We're here for #RSL! #BeatChivas

timelineItems.name: Josh Soelberg
timelineItems.text: Not a bad day for road teams in #MLS -- time for #RSL to show the goats how we do this. #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.name: Sam Stejskal
timelineItems.text: #RSL's Robbie Findley making his first start in league play this year. He'll score two goals tonight.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Group of what looks to be 20-to-30 #RSL fans louder than most inside StubHub Center. Now I know how @tribjazz felt in Milwaukee.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 7 - 7 of Erick Torres’ 9 goals for @cdchivasusa in @MLS 2014 have been the first goal in the game. Spark. #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Martin Rivero tries a through ball, but Leandro Barrera is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sean Harlow
timelineItems.text: Man, #RSL is rusty with it’s passing right now.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Chris Wingert.

timelineItems.name: Charlie Zahn
timelineItems.text: If the line is going to be that high there will be three goals easy. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Attempt missed. Carlos Bocanegra (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Mauro Rosales with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Midfielders John Stertzer and Sebastian Velasquez warming up with Dan Barlow. Best guess would be Findley comes off sometime soon. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Talon Chappell
timelineItems.text: I'm gonna be disappointed if both Plata and Findley don't score against Chivas USA tonight. #RSL #RoadWarriors #3Points

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Donny Toia (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Mauro Rosales.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Donny Toia blasts one just outside of the post

timelineItems.name: raulz801
timelineItems.text: What the hell happened to Javi's service? We look like hell. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Real Salt Lake. Javier Morales tries a through ball, but Joao Plata is caught offside.
Match ends, Chivas USA 1, Real Salt Lake 0.

timelineItems.name: Jordan Close
timelineItems.text: That sucked #RSL

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: Despite playing with only 10 men, #RSL have had the majority of the ball (55% possession), the boys didn't create chances with it. #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Jeff Cassar is in the ear of official Kevin Stott.

timelineItems.name: John Richards
timelineItems.text: Woof. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: Phenomenal volley from Erick Torres propels @cdchivasusa to 1-0 victory. http://t.co/QDHvByfI2E #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.text: Take Wingert out for Olmes and go with the tried-and-true 3-3-3 with Olmes at the point of attack winning balls. #RSL can score on this D.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Is it me or does chivas look very sharp tonight #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Cubo Torres is the first #chivasusa player to score ten goal since the 2007 season. David Beckham started that season at Real Madrid #mls

timelineItems.name: Taylor Acton
timelineItems.text: What happened to @RealSaltLake? Not playing like the team we've come to love. Haven't since mid-May. Dispiriting. No confidence/spark. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Talon Chappell
timelineItems.text: This sucks. If #RSL can't find a way to at least salvage a point out of this match, then they're gonna be in bad shape in the West.

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: Down a goal, down a man, no Beckerman, no Rimando, no Saborio, @RealSaltLake down and out. #RSL

timelineItems.name: utahsportingnews
timelineItems.text: Even with a man down #RSL had 55% of the possession. Now if we can just turn that into more shots on goal.

timelineItems.name: Jazzie Fizzle �
timelineItems.text: Pocos pero locos !! #chivasusa #blackarmy1850

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Down a man since the ninth minute, #RSL out-possessed Chivas USA 54.6 to 45.4 in the first half. So that's a silver lining, maybe.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Second half set to start and it looks like no changes for Jeff Cassar's group. Assume he'll see how 10 men handle initial pressure.

Chris Schuler (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: ThreeForAWin
timelineItems.text: That was such a non-call, cause it was a non-call. #CHVvRSL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Tony Lochhead.

timelineItems.name: Coach Bart Jernigan
timelineItems.text: Seems as if RSL has gone from "deepest team in MLS" to really average without our three national team dudes. #RSL #roughpatch

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Nat Borchers (Real Salt Lake) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Javier Morales with a cross.
Attempt saved. Olmes García (Real Salt Lake) with an attempt from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Joao Plata.
Foul by Sebastian Velasquez (Real Salt Lake).
Martin Rivero (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Hand ball by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).
Second Half ends, Chivas USA 1, Real Salt Lake 0.
